New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi took four wickets for 22 runs in the match.
Mohammad Haris scored 31 runs off 18 balls, contributing significantly to Pakistan's victory.
Key Match Events: Pakistan secured a five-wicket win over Bangladesh.
The match was crucial for Pakistan's progression to the semi-finals after South Africa's shock loss to the Netherlands.
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan's victory allowed them to advance to the semi-finals despite earlier defeats against India and Zimbabwe.
The match's outcome was pivotal as it determined the semi-final lineup.
